title: Zombie Male Character Portraits
description: Unearth 400 chilling Zombie Male Portraits, crafted for horror! Dual sizes (500x500 & 1000x1000) for versatility. Dive into diverse, undead tales across ages & ethnicities. PNGs with no backgrounds.
longDescription:
Unleash the undead and immerse yourself in a world of haunting horror with our Zombie Male Character Portraits collection. Expertly designed to capture the chilling essence of the post-apocalyptic, this collection promises to breathe (or rather, un-breathe) life into any project.


Within this spine-tingling pack, find 400 uniquely crafted portraits, each echoing tales of a world gone awry, of lives lost but not laid to rest. The relentless gaze of the undead, paired with the intricate details, ensures each image will send shivers down your spine and capture the imagination of your audience.


Every portrait has been meticulously rendered in two sizes: 500x500 and 1000x1000 pixels. This dual resolution ensures versatility for your projects. Whether you're looking to instill terror in a high-definition game splash screen or need a compact, eerie avatar, these sizes cater to your every whim.


The apocalypse knows no boundaries, and neither does our collection. Drawing from a wide spectrum of ethnicities and ages, these portraits encompass the diverse tapestry of humanity, albeit in their undead form. From the once-youthful gamer turned zombie to the elderly librarian, now craving more than just books, our collection offers a chilling variety, ensuring every project finds its perfect undead match.


Crafted in pristine PNG format, each portrait boasts a transparent background. This makes integration into your projects seamless, no matter the theme or palette. The clarity of these images, combined with the background-less design, ensures they can haunt any genre of videogame, from RPG to visual novel.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •   400 portraits in 2 sizes, for a total of 800 images.
  •  Watercolor style fits with many games styles.
  • Background free, allowing adaptation to any environment
  • Diverse collection of characters

Number of Textures:800

Texture Resolutions: 1000 x 1000, 500 x 500

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation:

Important/Additional Notes: Generated with AI, then edited to remove backgrounds and other tweaks.
